select * from TBL_SELL_PRODUCT inner join TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY on TBL_SELL_PRODUCT.SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY = TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NUM where TBL_SELL_PRODUCT.SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{categoryNum}
ORDER BY TBL_SELL_PRODUCT.SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE
ORDER BY TBL_SELL_PRODUCT.SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE desc
ORDER BY TBL_SELL_PRODUCT.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
ORDER BY TBL_SELL_PRODUCT.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
limit #{criteriaProduct.limit},6

select COUNT(*) from TBL_SELL_PRODUCT inner join TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY on TBL_SELL_PRODUCT.SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY = TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NUM where TBL_SELL_PRODUCT.SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{categoryNum}
select CATEGORY_NUM from TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY where CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName}

SELECT * FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE desc
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
limit #{criteriaProduct.limit},6

SELECT SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, tsp.USER_NUM, SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY, SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, SELL_PRODUCT_ORIGIN_PRICE, SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE, SELL_PRODUCT_EXPIRE_DATE, SELL_PRODUCT_STOCK, SELL_PRODUCT_STATUS, SELL_PRODUCT_PICKUP, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_METHOD, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS1, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS2, SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_ADDRESS3, SELL_PRODUCT_SHIPPING_METHOD, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_DETAIL, SELL_PRODUCT_ADDRESS_POST_NUM, SELL_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, SELL_PRODUCT_PHONE, SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH, SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UUID, tu.USER_NAME FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT tsp JOIN TBL_USER tu ON tsp.USER_NUM = tu.USER_NUM WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_NUM =#{sellProductNum}
SELECT COUNT(SELL_PRODUCT_NUM) FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_PICKUP = 1

SELECT * FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_PICKUP =1
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE desc
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
limit #{criteriaProduct.limit},6
SELECT COUNT(SELL_PRODUCT_NUM) FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_METHOD in(1,2)

SELECT * FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_METHOD in(1,2)
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE desc
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
limit #{criteriaProduct.limit},6
SELECT COUNT(SELL_PRODUCT_NUM) FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_SHIPPING_METHOD in(1,2)

SELECT * FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_SHIPPING_METHOD in(1,2)
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE desc
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc
limit #{criteriaProduct.limit},6

select p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, p.USER_NUM,p.SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY,p.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ORIGIN_PRICE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_EXPIRE_DATE,SELL_PRODUCT_STOCK ,p.SELL_PRODUCT_STATUS,p.SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL,p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH, p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UUID, count(r.review_num) review_count from TBL_SELL_PRODUCT p join TBL_REVIEW r on p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = r.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM group by p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, p.USER_NUM,p.SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY,p.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ORIGIN_PRICE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_EXPIRE_DATE,SELL_PRODUCT_STOCK ,p.SELL_PRODUCT_STATUS,p.SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL,p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH, p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UUID order by review_count desc limit 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BASKET WHERE USER_NUM=#{userNum} AND SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = #{sellProductNum} AND BASKET_DELIVERY_METHOD = #{basketDeliveryMethod}
